name: rssdoge

scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler deploy --config wrangler.toml
scripts.create-sentry-release: ./node_modules/.bin/dotenvx run -- ./node_modules/.bin/sentry-cli releases new "1.0.2" --finalize && ./node_modules/.bin/dotenvx run -- ./node_modules/.bin/sentry-cli releases files "1.0.2" upload-sourcemaps ./dist
scripts.dev: ./node_modules/.bin/dotenvx run -- wrangler dev --port 3000 --var TELEGRAM_TOKEN:"$TELEGRAM_TOKEN" --var SENTRY_DSN:"$SENTRY_DSN" --var ENVIRONMENT:development

author: melkikh <melkih.a.a@gmail.com>
//: @extractus/feed-extractor was fixed on 7.0.9 to avoid issues with Buffer API in the cloudflare workers
